text: The Iron Horse is a 1924 American western movie directed by John Ford and starring George O'Brien, Madge Bellamy, Cyril Chadwick, Will Walling, Francis Powers, J. Farrell MacDonald, Fred Kohler. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1924 movies Category:1920s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: The Iron Horse (movie)
